stimulusHtml: Which of the following questions best addresses whether a particular inhibitor is competitive or noncompetitive?

features.html:
Figure 1. Rate of an enzyme-catalyzed reaction

Researchers investigated the dynamics of a reaction catalyzed by an enzyme. The researchers prepared a series of reactions, each with the same concentration of enzyme but with different concentrations of substrate. The researchers measured the amount of product in each reaction mixture after 5 minutes. The results are shown in Figure 1.

choicesHtml: Does the inhibitor bind more tightly to the substrate or to the enzyme?
Can the inhibitor be converted to product by the enzyme?
How much inhibitor is necessary to completely inhibit the activity of the enzyme?
Does the inhibitor bind to an allosteric site or the active site of the enzyme?
